original_text: He then began to teach them that the Son of Man must suffer many things and be rejected by the elders, the chief priests and the teachers of the law, and that he must be killed and after three days rise again.
korean_text: 인자가 많은 고난을 받고 장로들과 대제사장들과 서기관들에게 버린 바 되어 죽임을 당하고 사흘 만에 살아나야 할 것을 비로소 그들에게 가르치시되

sentences.original_text: He then began to teach them
that the Son of Man must suffer many things
and be rejected by the elders
the chief priests and the teachers of the law
and that he must be killed
and after three days rise again
